question:
You have received a bill from a mobile phone (or cell phone) company for international call charges relating to a time when you did not use your phone for international calls.

Write a letter to the company,-complaining about this-giving your reasons-asking for the bill to be changed
text: I am one of your old customers, and for your kind reference, my customer  ID Number is 32567890. This letter is with regards to the bill of July 2022 in which I  noticed about the charges imposed for international calling that has not done by me, therefore writing you to complain about the same.

I used the phone solely for local calls and messages  this month, in fact for three months I have not done any calls outside the country. Moreover,  I have checked with other members of my family but no one else has done it  , and that can be seen in the call history records.

In view of the above, It seems these charges have been mistakenly added to my bill, therefore I would request you to verify the records again  and help me with the revised bill after withdrawing the unjustified charges.
I am looking forward to your confirmation on this matter at the earliest.
